terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: Welcome to DiscordList. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 13 years old to use our services. If you are under 18, you must have permission from a parent or guardian to use our services and they must agree to these Terms of Service on your behalf.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: When you create an account with us, you must provide accurate, complete, and current information. You are responsible for safeguarding the password and for all activities that occur under your account.

list.item1: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password.
list.item2: You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.
list.item3: You must notify us immediately upon becoming aware of any breach of security or unauthorized use of your account.

conduct.title: User Conduct
conduct.content: You agree not to use our services for any purpose that is unlawful or prohibited by these Terms. You may not use our services in any manner that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair our servers or networks.

list.item1: You will not post or transmit any content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, or otherwise objectionable.
list.item2: You will not impersonate any person or entity, or falsely state or otherwise misrepresent your affiliation with a person or entity.
list.item3: You will not attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion of the services, other accounts, computer systems, or networks.
list.item4: You will not collect or store personal data about other users without their express permission.
list.item5: You will not use our services for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of DiscordList and its licensors. The service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws of both the United States and foreign countries.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: In no event shall DiscordList, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your access to or use of or inability to access or use the service.

modifications.title: Modifications to Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the service will immediately cease.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us through our support channels.

botRequirements.title: Bot Requirements
botRequirements.subtitle: Guidelines for adding bots to our platform
botRequirements.introduction: To ensure a safe and high-quality experience for all users, we have established the following requirements for bots listed on our platform. Please review these guidelines carefully before submitting your bot.

noMalicious.title: No Malicious Bots
noMalicious.content: Bots designed for data theft, phishing, spam, or any other behavior harmful to user security will be permanently banned from the platform.

compliance.title: Compliance with Discord's Terms of Service
compliance.content: All bots must comply with Discord's Terms of Service. Bots that violate these rules may be removed without prior notice.

description.title: Clear Bot Description
description.content: When adding your bot to our list, provide a clear and detailed description of the bot's functionality. This helps users understand what the bot does and how it can be useful.

permissions.title: Appropriate Permissions
permissions.content: The bot should not request unnecessary or dangerous permissions, such as full server access or sending messages in private channels without authorization.

list.item1: The bot must be online and functional at the time of submission and maintain reasonable uptime (at least 90%).
list.item2: The bot must respond to basic commands and not have excessive latency.
list.item3: The bot must handle errors gracefully and not crash on invalid inputs.
list.item4: The bot's code should be reasonably secure and not contain obvious vulnerabilities.
list.item5: The bot should have a help command or documentation that explains its features and usage.

verification.title: Verification Process
verification.content: All bots submitted to our platform go through a verification process to ensure they meet our standards. The verification process includes:

list.item1: Initial review of the bot's description and functionality
list.item2: Testing of the bot's commands and features
list.item3: Security assessment to check for potential vulnerabilities
list.item4: Compliance check with our platform's guidelines and Discord's Terms of Service

penalties.title: Penalties for Violations
penalties.content: Failure to comply with these requirements may result in one or more of the following actions:

list.item1: Temporary suspension of the bot from our platform
list.item2: Permanent removal of the bot from our platform
list.item3: Suspension or banning of the bot owner's account

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: We reserve the right to modify these requirements at any time. It is your responsibility to stay informed about any changes to these requirements. We also reserve the right to remove any bot from our platform at our discretion, even if it complies with all stated requirements.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: At DiscordList, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our website.

information.title: Information We Collect
information.content: We collect several types of information from and about users of our website, including:

list.item1: Discord user ID, username, and avatar
list.item3: Information about your bots (if you add them to our platform)
list.item4: Any other information you choose to provide

list.item2: Pages you visit on our website and how you interact with them
list.item3: Referral source and time spent on the website

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect about you for various purposes, including:

list.item1: To provide, maintain, and improve our services
list.item2: To process and display your bots on our platform
list.item3: To communicate with you about updates, security alerts, and support
list.item4: To detect, prevent, and address technical issues
list.item5: To better understand how users interact with our website

sharing.title: Sharing Your Information
sharing.content: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in the following circumstances:

list.item1: With service providers who perform services on our behalf
list.item3: To protect and defend our rights and property

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We have implemented appropriate technical and organizational measures to secure your personal information from accidental loss and unauthorized access, use, alteration, and disclosure. However, please be aware that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and hold certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: Necessary for the website to function properly

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.content: Enable personalized features and remember your preferences

rights.title: Your Data Protection Rights
rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including:

list.item1: The right to access your personal information
list.item2: The right to rectify inaccurate personal information
list.item3: The right to request deletion of your personal information
list.item4: The right to restrict processing of your personal information

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'last updated' date at the top of this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our support channels.

topBots.title: Top Voted Bots
topBots.description: Discover the most popular bots on our platform, ranked by user votes. These bots have been recognized by our community for their quality and usefulness.

newBots.title: Recently Added Bots
newBots.description: Check out the latest additions to our platform. These bots were recently added and are waiting to be discovered by you.

popularBots.title: Most Used Bots
popularBots.description: These bots are widely used across many Discord servers. Discover the most popular bots based on server count.
